body:
I've seen a lot of Nebula timelapses on YouTube which were recorded in the good old MCZone times, so I thought I might do some aswell. If I get a good result, I might do more, and if you have feedback (ex. better texture pack, music, speed, ) please leave it here :) I'll try to upload 1-3 timelapses a week - if somebody will watch them. :P

YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/atdit142r
Timelapse Playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtWD4dMzmJiKpOwxodgSLpEzGkx06LSq5

Parts released: Test Part 0: Avicus Nebula Timelapses - Part #001 - Clay Wars


All timelapses were rendered with Sony Vegas Pro 13.0. Their speed is 4x faster than the normal gameplay speed.

Greetings,
-Atdit

title: Atdit's Nebula Timelapses [Video-Hub]

replies.body: upload timelapses of interesting matches if youre going to take this thing seriously, cause matches usually take 2-3 minutes and stuff on public so try and choose interesting matches.
replies.body_tagged: upload timelapses of interesting matches if youre going to take this thing seriously, cause matches usually take 2-3 minutes and stuff on public so try and choose interesting matches.

replies.body: Yea I only upload matches with skybridges, many players and with a length between 15-30 minutes.
